### Example 1: The Set-AzVmssStorageProfile cmdlet sets the storage profile properties for the Virtual Machine Scale Set (VMSS). (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Set-AzVmssStorageProfile -ImageReferenceOffer $ImgRef.Offer -ImageReferencePublisher {ImageReferencePublisher} -ImageReferenceSku $ImgRef.Skus -ImageReferenceVersion $ImgRef.Version -ManagedDisk {ManagedDisk} -OsDiskCaching None -OsDiskCreateOption FromImage -VirtualMachineScaleSet ContosoVMSS
```
